title.rendered: T’way Air in Seoul, South Korea

content.rendered:
T’way Air Co., Ltd. , formerly Hansung Airlines, is a South Korean low-cost airline based in Seongsu-dong, Seongdong-gu, Seoul. In 2018, it is the third largest Korean low-cost carrier in the international market, carried 2.9 million domestic passengers and 4.2 million international passengers.

T’way Air began as Hansung Airlines, which began flying between 2005 and 2008, after which the company reorganized and rebranded in 2010. The ‘t’ in t’way stands for together, today and tomorrow. The airline was established on 8 August 2010 with two Boeing 737-800s.

T’way Air Contact Address, Phone, Working hours and Website

Address : 3rd FL, Gimpo Airport Cargo Terminal, 210 Haneul-gil, Gangseo-gu, Seoul

Phone:  +82 1688 – 8686
Business hours :07:00 – 19:00 (KST)

T’way Air Official website : https://www.twayair.com/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with T’way Air

Fleet size: 28

  • Airbus A330-300
  • Boeing 737-800
  • Boeing 737 MAX 8

T’way Air Baggage Allowance

View T’way Air Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Queries handled by T’way Air Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the T’way Air in South Korea Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the T’way Air in South Korea: (click on the stars below)
